title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 573.5 - Temporary suspension or limitation of any operating certificate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 573.5 - Temporary suspension or limitation of any operating certificate

State Regulations

When the commissioner has temporarily suspended or limited an
operating certificate for a period not in excess of 60 days as provided in
section
31.16
(b) of the Mental Hygiene Law, the facility
operator may request an evidentiary hearing to contest the validity of the
emergency suspension or limitation in accordance with Part 503 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
573.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
